articles.title: Heranshan Subramaniam
articles.contents:
Heranshan Portfolio
          
          
          Data Science Models & Reports

          Nigeria Water Point Functionality Prediction
          Reaction Time of Olympic Swimmers Hypothesis Testing

          ▾
          
          
          Superstore Dashboard

          Global Population Time Series
          Global GDP Breakdown
          Singapore Arrival Data
          Singapore Population Gender Distribution
          Singapore Property Transactions
          VAST Challenge 2022 - Pub Visitorship
          Singapore Pools Map
          Singapore Stocks Bolinger Bands
          Singapore Stocks Candlestick Chart
          
          
          
          
          Excel Modelling
           
          ▾
          
          
          Carbon Efficient Singapore
          
          
          
          
          ☰
          
          
      
        
          
            Heranshan Subramaniam
          
          
            
              Hello World! I am a Commodity Analyst at S&P Global
              with a Masters of IT in Business (Analytics) from
              Singapore Management University. I have a background in R,
              python, SQL, JMP, Tableau and PowerBI. Prior to my data
              science journey, I spent 3.5 years as an engineer at
              ExxonMobil, dealing with production data, dashboards and
              project management in a high stakes, high pressure
              environment.
